title.en: English for Intermediate Learners II, Level B2.1 > B2.2
title.et: Inglise keel kesktasemele II, tase B2.1 > B2.2

description.en: During the course, students will do various types of exercises to revise grammar and improve their vocabulary, as well as practise listening, writing and speaking.
description.et: Kursuse käigus tehakse harjutusi grammatika kinnistamiseks ja sõnavara laiendamiseks, kuulamisülesandeid ja kirjalikke töid, arendatakse vestlusoskust ning loetakse tekste kõrgemal kesktasemel.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to develop reading, speaking, listening and writing skills as well as improve vocabulary and practise grammar at B2 (upper intermediate) level.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on kõigi nelja osaoskuse (lugemine, kirjutamine, kuulamine, rääkimine) arendamine, sõnavara laiendamine ja grammatika harjutamine B2 tasemel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course students will have improved their vocabulary range and knowledge of grammar, are able to use the vocabulary and language structures in both written and spoken form, can understand and find essential information in upper intermediate texts, are able to speak on different topics.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukalt lõpetanu oskab kasutada õpitud sõnavara ja keelestruktuure kõnes ja kirjas, mõistab keskmise raskusastmega tekste ning oskab leida neist olulist informatsiooni, on võimeline kõnelema erinevatel teemadel.

description.et: Reading and summarizing a subject-specific article

grade_preconditions.et:
1 Aktiivne osalemine seminarides (80%). ACTIVE participation in the seminars (80%, four absences allowed). Active participation means attending classes, doing homework regularly (weekly tasks - reading articles, doing vocabulary exercises, preparing for the seminars and participating in whole-class discussions), submitting written assignments on time and passing weekly self-assessments tests on different grammar topics.
2 Positiivne tulemus kolmes kontrolltöös (70% õigeid vastuseid). Passing three vocabulary and grammar tests with the minimum score of 70%. 
3 Erialase ettekande tegemine. Making a presentation on a subject-specific topic.
4 Erialase artikli lugemine ja kokkuvõtte tegemine. Reading and summarising a subject-specific article.

grade_evaluation.et:
Arvestus saadakse siis, kui SEMESTRI JOOKSUL on täidetud kõik hindamisele pääsemise tingimused.
Non-differentiated assessment based on ACTIVE PARTICIPATION in the seminars, passing three vocabulary and grammar tests, making a presentation on a subject-specific topic, reading and summarising a subject-specific article.

debt_elimination.et:
Kokkuleppel õppejõuga.
By prior arrangement with the teacher.
